VIPSPage.PageTitle: Walmart.com Help: Manage and Pay Your Walmart Credit Card Account

LayoutNode.Content: Walmart.com Help Center Find Answers Manage and Pay Your Walmart Credit Card Account
LayoutNode.SRC: Walmart.com Help Center Find Answers Manage and Pay Your Walmart Credit Card Account

LayoutNode.Content: Manage and Pay Your Walmart Credit Card Account
LayoutNode.SRC: Manage and Pay Your Walmart Credit Card Account

LayoutNode.Content: You can manage your Walmart Credit Card or Walmart MasterCard in these convenient ways:
LayoutNode.SRC: You can manage your Walmart Credit Card or Walmart MasterCard in these convenient ways:

LayoutNode.Content: Check Your Balance
LayoutNode.SRC: Check Your Balance

LayoutNode.Content: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account to check your balance.
LayoutNode.SRC: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Accountto check your balance.

LayoutNode.Content: Pay Your Walmart Credit Card
LayoutNode.SRC: Pay Your Walmart Credit Card

LayoutNode.Content: Online e-Payment By phone By mail In a store Using CheckFree
LayoutNode.SRC: Onlinee-PaymentBy phoneBy mailIn a storeUsing CheckFree

LayoutNode.Content: Pay your card online
LayoutNode.SRC: Pay your card online

LayoutNode.Content: Sign into your Walmart Credit Card account to make a payment now.
LayoutNode.SRC: Sign into your Walmart Credit Card accountto make a payment now.

LayoutNode.Content: If you haven't enrolled your account online yet, select First Time User? Register Online payments will post to your account in 2-3 business days. You can pay using e-Payment or through CheckFree. Learn more about e-Payment or register with CheckFree to make a payment. At this time, our online payment service cannot accept recurring payments or payments by debit card. Click here to go back to the top of this page.
LayoutNode.SRC: If you haven't enrolled your account online yet, select First Time User? RegisterOnline payments will post to your account in 2-3 business days.You can pay using e-Payment or through CheckFree. Learn more about e-Payment or register with CheckFreeto make a payment.At this time, our online payment service cannot accept recurring payments or payments by debit card.Click here to go back to the top of this page.

LayoutNode.Content: Pay using e-Payment
LayoutNode.SRC: Pay using e-Payment

LayoutNode.Content: E-Payment must be set up directly with your bank account. You need to have a valid checking account from a U.S. financial institution and the following information:
LayoutNode.SRC: E-Payment must be set up directly with your bank account. You need to have a valid checking account from a U.S. financial institution and the following information:

LayoutNode.Content: Bank name Checking account number Bank routing number (the first nine numbers from the left at the bottom of your checks)
LayoutNode.SRC:
• Bank name
  • Checking account number
  • Bank routing number (the first nine numbers from the left at the bottom of your checks)

LayoutNode.Content: When using e-Payment, you may choose one of the following four options for the amount you pay:
LayoutNode.SRC: When using e-Payment, you may choose one of the following four options for the amount you pay:

LayoutNode.Content: Total Minimum Payment Due: The amount you must pay in order to avoid a late payment fee. Last Statement Balance: The balance reflected in your previous statement (previous balance minus payments and adjustments plus transactions and finance charges). Current Balance: All transactions since your last statement. Other: Any amount up to your current balance. You may place a stop payment on an e-Payment, but only if your e-Payment is pending or has not been processed.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Total Minimum Payment Due: The amount you must pay in order to avoid a late payment fee.Last Statement Balance: The balance reflected in your previous statement (previous balance minus payments and adjustments plus transactions and finance charges).Current Balance: All transactions since your last statement.Other: Any amount up to your current balance.
  • You may place a stop payment on an e-Payment, but only if your e-Payment is pending or has not been processed.

LayoutNode.Content: Sign into your Walmart Credit Card account to set up e-Payment now. Click here to go back to the top of this page.
LayoutNode.SRC: Sign into your Walmart Credit Card accountto set up e-Payment now.Click here to go back to the top of this page.

LayoutNode.Content: Pay by phone
LayoutNode.SRC: Pay by phone

LayoutNode.Content: This service is free if you use the automated payment method. If you choose to have a representative assist you with your bill payment, a $10 (ten dollar) service charge willapply. Please have your checking account information (check number, routing number, etc.) available when calling.
LayoutNode.SRC: This service is free if you use the automated payment method. If you choose to have a representative assist you with your bill payment, a $10 (ten dollar) service charge will apply. Please have your checking account information (check number, routing number, etc.) available when calling.

LayoutNode.Content: You can pay by phone with your debit card using Speedpay.
LayoutNode.SRC: You can pay by phone with your debit card using Speedpay.

LayoutNode.Content: Walmart Credit Card: 1-877-294-7880
LayoutNode.SRC: Walmart Credit Card: 1-877-294-7880

LayoutNode.Content: Walmart MasterCard: 1-866-611-1148 Click here to go back to the top of this page.
LayoutNode.SRC: Walmart MasterCard: 1-866-611-1148Click here to go back to the top of this page.

LayoutNode.Content: Pay by mail If you would like to pay your Walmart Credit Card by mail, please send your payment to: Walmart/SYNCB PO Box 530927 Atlanta, GA 30353-0927 If you would like to pay your Walmart MasterCard by mail, please send your payment to: Walmart MasterCard/SYNCB PO Box 960024 Orlando, FL 32896-0024 Click here to go back to the top of this page.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Pay by mailIf you would like to pay your Walmart Credit Card by mail, please send your payment to:Walmart/SYNCBPO Box 530927Atlanta, GA 30353-0927If you would like to pay your Walmart MasterCard by mail, please send your payment to:Walmart MasterCard/SYNCBPO Box 960024Orlando, FL 32896-0024


Click here to go back to the top of this page.


Click here to go back to the top of this page.

LayoutNode.Content: Pay in a store
LayoutNode.SRC: Pay in a store

LayoutNode.Content: You can make a payment to your account in any Walmart store at the Customer Service desk. If you are a Sam's Club member, then you can also make a payment at anySam's Club location. Payments made in a store will be posted within 24-48 hours of the transaction.
LayoutNode.SRC: You can make a payment to your account in any Walmart store at the Customer Service desk. If you are a Sam's Club member, then you can also make a payment at any Sam's Club location. Payments made in a store will be posted within 24-48 hours of the transaction.

LayoutNode.Content: We are unable to look up your account in the store. Please make sure you have your Walmart Credit Card or Walmart MasterCard statement present for processing. Click here to go back to the top of this page.
LayoutNode.SRC:
We are unable to look up your account in the store. Please make sure you have your Walmart Credit Card or Walmart MasterCard statement present for processing.

Click here to go back to the top of this page.

LayoutNode.Content: Use CheckFree You can also make a payment online through CheckFree . You will need to either register or sign in to your CheckFree account to make a payment. Click here to go back to the top of this page.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Use CheckFreeYou can also make a payment online through CheckFree. Opens in new window You will need to either register or sign in to your CheckFree account to make a payment.


Click here to go back to the top of this page.Click here to go back to the top of this page.

LayoutNode.Content: Update Your Mailing Address or Phone Number
LayoutNode.SRC: Update Your Mailing Address or Phone Number

LayoutNode.Content: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account On the account summary page, select Update Personal Information in the menu on the left This service may not be available to all cardholders If you need assistance please contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days aweek
LayoutNode.SRC:
Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card AccountOn the account summary page, select Update Personal Information in the menu on the left
  • This service may not be available to all cardholders
    • If you need assistance please contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days aweek

LayoutNode.Content: Reset a Forgotten Password
LayoutNode.SRC: Reset a Forgotten Password

LayoutNode.Content: Enter your username on the Walmart Credit Cards Login Page Select Reset Password You will be asked to answer your Challenge Question and enter your account details before you are allowed to change your password.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Enter your username on the Walmart Credit Cards Login PageSelect Reset Password
  • You will be asked to answer your Challenge Question and enter your account details before you are allowed to change your password.

LayoutNode.Content: Request a Credit Limit Increase or Decrease
LayoutNode.SRC: Request a Credit Limit Increase or Decrease

LayoutNode.Content: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account . Select Request a Credit Limit Increase Or you can contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account.Select Request a Credit Limit Increase
  • Or you can contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

LayoutNode.Content: Report a Lost or Stolen Card
LayoutNode.SRC: Report a Lost or Stolen Card

LayoutNode.Content: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account Go to the Account Summary page Select Request Replacement Card You can also contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week
LayoutNode.SRC:
Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account
  • Go to the Account Summary page
    • Select Request Replacement Card
  • You can also contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week

LayoutNode.Content: Dispute a Charge
LayoutNode.SRC: Dispute a Charge

LayoutNode.Content: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account . Go to the Account Summary page Select Dispute a Charge You can also contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account.
  • Go to the Account Summary page
    • Select Dispute a Charge
  • You can also contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

LayoutNode.Content: Request a Credit Balance Refund
LayoutNode.SRC: Request a Credit Balance Refund

LayoutNode.Content: Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account . Go to the Account Summary page Select Credit Balance Refund You can also contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Sign in to your Walmart Credit Card Account.
  • Go to the Account Summary page
    • Select Credit Balance Refund
  • You can also contact Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880. Representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

LayoutNode.Content: Add someone to your Credit Card Account
LayoutNode.SRC: Add someone to your Credit Card Account

LayoutNode.Content: You can add an authorized user over the phone by calling Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880 You can also add an authorized user on the account management page of your Walmart Credit Card Account . You are responsible for any purchases the authorized user makes.
LayoutNode.SRC:
You can add an authorized user over the phone by calling Walmart Credit Services toll-free at 1-877-294-7880You can also add an authorized user on the account management page of your Walmart Credit Card Account.
  • You are responsible for any purchases the authorized user makes.
